body: Hehe what a wholesome ntr
NTR but happy ending sheesh
ntr but happy ending
i have never seen such a wholesome ntr doujin
The only thing i dont like was he kinda pimped her out but then he not only won financially through connections and pretty much got a harem(ish) end like respect?

This netorase managed to do what not even vanilla manages to do. It shows the reader that these two characters really fucking LOVE each other and nothing will ever separate them. I even got a bit emotional in the end, to be honest. I also see a lot of NTR with "happy" endings that do nothing to show that the main couple will stay together because they belong with each other. THIS is how you portray an inseparable couple.
Huh, a series where the MC NTRs himself on purpose, you don't see those everyday.
Better than generic netorase so 9999999999..../10
For netorase standart i give 8/10 (I hate old man)
THIS IS A FUCKING NTR YOU IDIOT, AND ONE THING AGAIN I WANT TO SAY WHY THE FUCK DID YOU MADE THE MC(IKKUN) REALLY IDIOT? ARE THIS ARTIST REALLY IDIOT LIKE THIS MC(IKKUN?)
Hell yeah!
After reading this , my standards for netorase became high. Cant find any worthy to read that good as this one 😣

I didn't expect this series to have a wholesome ending given that the story falls into Netorase genre. Most stories with that kind of genre always have a depressing ending. This is quite rare in my opinion.
Wholesome ending!
Ooh a NTR MC that's tricking his wife into having sex with other dudes, that's not a genre you see often.
Man, i wish there would be more inseki scene...

A headsup! This series is missing its bonus ending. Only ONE copy of it on Hitomi had the "Bonus Manga" titled "Helpful Wife" or "Wife wants to help out" (I can't read Korean very well):
https://hitomi.la/galleries/795290.html

I feel bad for the girl when she grew up and says to her mom about 'mom, who is my dad?'. Her mother would then smile at her little flower says 'your dad is my son'. Either the girl would be ok with a poker face or face dumbstruck XD

If you wonder why it's NTR, it's not for Netorare. It's for Netorase. Different meaning but can still be considered similar and until they fix the tags...
Should just be labeled as swinging....check that tag out, it's great

A comedy NTR with a bittersweet ending.
I approve it.
This is the ultimate cure to all NTR angst.

Well, I guess love comes with all kinds of form and shape, really look like Netosarerare (do I get that title right ?) but the difference is the heroine in this one still love the guy, while in the other one, sh*t, I don't even understand what's going on and the conclusion of Netosarerare, lul.
This is not NTR. The main characters have a happy ending
Why was this series labeled NTR? I really didn't see any elements reading it.
chinese version please
yess, a Happy ending !
